DOC.brief_summary: To compare short term risk benefit cord milk 5 time toward neonate delay cord clamp 120 second full term neonate deliver cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Milking Versus Delayed Cord Clamping Full Term Neonates
DOC.detailed_description: Abstract Context : milk umbilical cord toward neonate 5 time delay cord clamp good procedure prevent anemia neonate . Objective : To investigate effect delay umbilical cord clamp 120 second , compare milking cord 5 time toward neonate hemoglobin level 6 week , Intubation , Respiratory distress , Clinical jaundice , Neonatal Intensive Care unit ( NICU ) admission , Apgar score ( 5 minute delivery ) . -Maternal , Need blood transfusion , Additional need therapeutic uterotonics , Post postpartum hemorrhage ( blood loss > 500cc ) , Intensive Care unit admission . Design : Randomized controlled trial . Setting : Ain Shams university maternity hospital . Participants:300 full term infant bear low risk pregnancy cesarean section delivery . Intervention : Infants randomize delayed umbilical cord clamping ( â‰¥120 second delivery ) cord milking ( 5 time ward neonate ) .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant female go cesarean section complete 37 week gestation Medically free Known congenital anomaly fetus . Rhesus sensitization . Fetal hydrops . Medical disorder ( preeclampsia diabetes mellitus hypertension SLE ) . Need urgent resuscitation . Multiple pregnancy .
